thread.title: Philip
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Philip

author: Philip
title: Philip
text: Brian Kelly from R&G Brenner is great. I've been working with him every tax season for the last 3-4 years and every time, he makes filing taxes simple and easy. I send him the info and he takes care of business without issue. Plus, whenever I have questions, he's available via email or phone call. Great guy and great company!
